document_data.name: Vauge
document_data.mainbody: '''Vauge''' was a plant that grew wild in the [[Shaar]]. It was known as '''voj-weed''' in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]]. Vauge was used to make [[vauge tea|tea]] and was available at [[Munsrum's Ready Ladle]] in Khôltar, the Iron City.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|76}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 59: Khôltar, Part 10, Hungry in Handrornlar, and More}}
